hero.title: Secrets Management for
hero.description: Your agents need API keys — they don't need the keys to the kingdom. Authy is a CLI secrets manager with encrypted vault, scoped policies, run-only tokens, and full audit trail. Agents inject secrets into subprocesses but never see the values. Single binary, no server, no accounts.

features.title: Built for the Agent Age
features.description: Traditional secrets managers weren't designed for AI agents. Claude Code reads .env files silently. OpenClaw stores API keys in plaintext. HashiCorp Vault requires a server. Authy gives agents scoped access with run-only enforcement — they inject secrets into subprocesses but never see the values.

encryptedVault.title: Encrypted Vault
encryptedVault.description: Single age-encrypted file using X25519 keys or scrypt passphrases. Secrets stored in MessagePack format for speed. All data encrypted at rest with modern cryptography. No metadata leakage.

scopedPolicies.title: Scoped Access Policies
scopedPolicies.description: Glob-based allow/deny rules per agent scope. Define exactly what each agent can access. Policies stored inside the encrypted vault — tamper-proof by design. Deny overrides allow, default deny for security.

sessionTokens.title: Run-Only Tokens
sessionTokens.description: HMAC-SHA256 validated tokens with run-only enforcement. Agents can inject secrets via authy run but cannot read values directly. Short-lived with configurable TTL, scannable authy_v1. prefix for leak detection, and instant revocation.

subprocessInjection.title: Subprocess Secret Injection
subprocessInjection.description: Inject secrets as environment variables only into the child process. In run-only mode, this is the only way agents can access secrets — get, env, and export are blocked. Zero trace after process exit.

auditLogging.title: Tamper-Evident Audit Logging
auditLogging.description: Append-only JSONL log with HMAC chain verification. Track every secret access with actor identity, timestamp, operation type, and access outcome. Detect any log tampering instantly.

adminTUI.title: Admin Terminal UI
adminTUI.description: Full-screen terminal interface for managing secrets, policies, sessions, and audit logs. Masked input fields ensure secrets never touch shell history. Intuitive keyboard-driven interface.

quickStart.title: Quick Start
quickStart.description: Get up and running in under a minute. Authy is a single static binary with zero runtime dependencies — just download and run. Designed for CI/CD integration, Docker containers, and local development workflows.

comparison.title: Why Choose Authy?
comparison.description: Authy is the only secrets manager designed specifically for the unique needs of local-first AI agent workflows. Compare our features against traditional solutions.

securityBanner.title: Stop leaking secrets in your shell history forever.
securityBanner.description: Even <0>echo "secret" | tool</0> can expose sensitive data in shell history. Authy's TUI uses masked input fields that never touch your shell history, process arguments, or parent environment. Secrets remain truly secret.

footer.description: Give your AI agents the secrets they need without giving them the keys to the kingdom. Secure, scoped, local-first secrets management for the agent age.
